suite.name: CT012 ValidarInformacoesCandidato.robot

test.name: CT002 - Validar criação de uma conta com Email já cadastrado

kw.name: Abrir o Navegador
Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.
Abre o navegador e maximiza a janela.

kw.name: Acessar Tela de Login
Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Enabled
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is enabled.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.
Clica no botão "Criar uma conta" para acessar a tela de cadastro.

kw.name: Preencher Campo de E-mail
Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.
Clica no campo de e-mail e insere o e-mail cadastrado.

kw.name: Preencher Campo de Senha
Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.
Clica no campo de e-mail e insere o e-mail cadastrado.

kw.name: Confirmar Dados de Cadastro
Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.
Preenche os campos de email e senha no formulário de cadastro.

kw.name: Validar Tela de Clientes
Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Page Should Contain Element
kw.msg: Current page contains element '//h1[normalize-space()='Gestão de Clientes']'.
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` is found on the current page.
Valida que a página "Gestão de Clientes" foi carregada corretamente após login.

kw.name: Validar Informações do Candidato e Enviar
Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.msg: Typing text 'Bruna Rosa' into text field '//input[@id='nome']'.
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.msg: Typing text 'Dionathan e Kely' into text field '//input[@id='nomeRecrutador']'.
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Log To Console
kw.arg: Dados do candidato preenchidos e enviados com sucesso.
kw.doc: Logs the given message to the console.
Valida as informações do candidato e envia os dados preenchendo o formulário.

kw.name: Fechar o Navegador
Close Browser
kw.doc: Closes the current browser.
Fecha o navegador.

test.doc: Teste para validar erro ao tentar criar uma conta com um email já cadastrado.

suite.doc: Esta suite testa o cadastro de Clientes
